synopsis.text: Music video for the globally unifying song, "Sekai wo Musubou," performed by Sandra and the Morinoki Children Choir, graced the screens of NHK's Minna no Uta program. The vibrant animation, brought to life by Akira Maeda, extends an invitation to people worldwide to immerse themselves in the enchanting beauty of the Mediterranean. This captivating music video encapsulates the essence of unity and shared experiences through the universal language of music and stunning visuals.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
